programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Lacy's Christmas Do-Over
programme.desc: Lacy, a career-driven business woman, goes to a B&B in Illinois at the advice of a new therapist. There she finds herself stuck in a mystical, small Christmas town, reliving the same day over and over. Lacy must figure out how to escape.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: A Very British Christmas
programme.desc: American opera singer Jessica Bailey's flight to her concert in Vienna becomes delayed in a remote area of England. The only place to stay is a bed-and-breakfast in Pine Falls, an enchanting village run by a young, handsome, widower Andrew with his precocious daughter, Katie. Spending time with them allows romance to blossom as Jessica learns he is an amazing artist, but a struggling entrepreneur. With snowflakes in the air, Jessica faces a choice: career or love.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Santa Claus: The Movie
programme.desc: Saint Nick hires an elf with sloppy craftsmanship to work at his North Pole toy factory.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The Fits
programme.desc: An isolated 11-year-old girl joins a dance drill team at her local rec center, but her newfound friends and teammates begin to suffer from mysterious fainting episodes.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Our Ghosts
programme.desc: Evicted from their apartment, a father and son try to scare new tenants.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Downhill Racer
programme.desc: Robert Redford as an egotist skiing with the U.S. team in Europe. Fine skiing footage; filmed on location. Gene Hackman, Camilla Sparv, Jim McMullan. D.K.: Kenneth Kirk. Mayo: Dabney Coleman. Machet: Karl Michael Vogler. Tommy: Joe Jay Albert. Directed by Michael Ritchie.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Lola
programme.desc: Ruby struggles to understand the cause behind the rift in her relationship with Paul.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Midnight Sun
programme.desc: A sheltered girl named Katie has a rare disease that makes exposure to sunlight deadly. A chance encounter with her childhood crush, Charlie, leads to an unlikely summer romance that gets complicated when Katie finally reveals her medical condition.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Elizabeth: A Portrait in Part(s)
programme.desc: A documentary on the life of Queen Elizabeth II, the longest-lived, longest reigning British monarch and longest serving female head of state in history.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Ernest Saves Christmas
programme.desc: Ernest scrambles to find a successor for Santa Claus in this Yuletide comedy.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Mr. Malcolm's List
programme.desc: Jeremy Malcolm is the most sought bachelor in the English countryside. Rumors surface of a list that lays out all the perfect qualities for Mr. Malcolm's future wife. A suitor from out of town hears about Mr. Malcolm and is convinced she can win him over. Based on the novel Mr. Malcolm's List by Suzanne Allain.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Imagine That
programme.desc: This winning family film stars Eddie Murphy as an ambitious financial whiz who sacrifices time with his 7-year-old daughter (Yara Shahidi) for the sake of his job. One day his daughter's imaginary world unexpectedly helps his career, prompting him to improve their strained relationship. Directed by Karey Kirkpatrick. Thomas Haden Church, Ronny Cox, Martin Sheen.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: A Christmas Wedding Tail
programme.desc: A widowed museum curator finds love with a single dad thanks to some matchmaking by their canine pals, who recently made a love connection. The pair plan a Christmas wedding, but multiple complications threaten the union.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Saving Christmas
programme.desc: A young boy and his friends launch an investigation to find out the truth about Santa. They discover he's real and he's creating toys right in their town.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Angels Sing
programme.desc: A man is forced to confront his past during the holiday season.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Wonderful Time of the Year, A
programme.desc: The Marsh family is getting together for their first Christmas Eve after three years of pandemic lockdown.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Ernest Saves Christmas
programme.desc: Ernest scrambles to find a successor for Santa Claus in this Yuletide comedy.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: As Good as It Gets
programme.desc: James L. Brooks' acclaimed romantic comedy about a plucky New York waitress (Helen Hunt) and a phobic, curmudgeonly novelist (Jack Nicholson). Greg Kinnear costars as his gay neighbor in this story of love, forgiveness and acceptance. The three leads were Oscar-nominated. Cuba Gooding Jr., Skeet Ulrich, Shirley Knight.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Steel Magnolias
programme.desc: Robert Harling adapted and expanded his stage hit, a character study set in small-town Louisiana that celebrates friendship among a group of strong-willed women who discuss their lives—especially the shortcomings of their men—at Truvy's beauty salon. Julia Roberts earned her first Oscar nomination as Best Supporting Actress for her portrayal of stubborn Shelby. Harling costars as the minister.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Heaven Can Wait
programme.desc: A quarterback's soul is mistakenly sent to heaven after an accident, and his body is cremated. Before long, he's given a new body on Earth and sparks a relationship with an activist who's against his persona's bad practices. Based on the play by Harry Segall. Remake of "Here Comes Mr. Jordan."

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: A misfit, picked-on teen's life turns around when he discovers he's descendant from a line of werewolves. By unleashing his inner beast, he becomes a basketball star, and works up the courage to try and win his dream girl away from her unpleasant boyfriend.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Smokey and the Bandit
programme.desc: The Bandit, a charismatic bootlegger, takes a bet to ship a truck full of beer from Texas to Arkansas. While pulling off the stunt, he falls in love with a woman engaged to the son of a dyspeptic sheriff who takes it upon himself to stop Bandit.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Mr. Malcolm's List
programme.desc: Jeremy Malcolm is the most sought bachelor in the English countryside. Rumors surface of a list that lays out all the perfect qualities for Mr. Malcolm's future wife. A suitor from out of town hears about Mr. Malcolm and is convinced she can win him over. Based on the novel Mr. Malcolm's List by Suzanne Allain.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Love Means Zero
programme.desc: Featuring the life and work of American tennis coach Nick Bollettieri.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: A Little Game
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl wants to learn how to play chess in order to defeat a rival at school. She takes lessons from an elderly man who's a master at the game, and the pair eventually bond.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Muhammad Ali: The Greatest. Of All Time.
programme.desc: Muhammad Ali talks a suicidal stranger down from a ledge, using his unique brand of wit and wisdom.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The Real Charlie Chaplin
programme.desc: A raw and striking portrait of noteworthy silent film actor Charlie Chaplin. Never-before-seen clips from Chaplin's candid interview with Life Magazine in 1966 sheds light on the actor's upbringing and unexpected foray into the entertainment industry. The interview, woven together with clips from Chaplin's films, provides a meditation on Chaplin's impact on Hollywood from the actor's own perspective.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The House of Mirth
programme.desc: Strong performances, gorgeous costumes and sumptuous art direction distinguish this adaptation of Edith Wharton's novel. Gillian Anderson stars as a unmarried woman who falls from grace in early 20th-century New York City, where the upper classes have little use for an independent female who refuses to play by the rules. Eric Stoltz, Anthony LaPaglia, Laura Linney, Dan Aykroyd, Elizabeth McGovern.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The Nanny Diaries
programme.desc: Scarlett Johansson stars in this hilarious adaptation of the bestseller. A recent college grad takes a job as a live-in nanny for the troubled son of a snooty, neurotic Upper East Side socialite and her nasty, adulterous husband. Laura Linney, Alicia Keys, Chris Evans, Donna Murphy, Paul Giamatti. Directed by Shari Springer Berman and Robert Pulcini.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Saving Flora
programme.desc: A circus Elephant named Flora who can no longer perform her tricks is scheduled to be euthanized. However, the night before, Dawn, the circus owner's 14-year-old daughter, escapes from the circus together with Flora to take her away from danger. Dawn's mission is to take Flora to the elephant preserve where she will be safe from any harm. To achieve it, they will need to make it through kilometers of woods, an enraged river, and two elephant hunters.

programme.title: Clockstoppers
programme.desc: Jesse Bradford and French Stewart star in this cute family fantasy about a teen who discovers that a special watch invented by his father has the ability to freeze time. But he finds himself battling sinister forces after his dad is kidnapped. Paula Garces, Michael Biehn, Robin Thomas.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A greedy CEO (Denis Leary) takes over a struggling toy company and begins producing militaristic action figures with computerized minds of their own. It's up to a pair of suburban kids to stop them from destroying their peaceful enemies after the violent commandoes spring to life. Gregory Smith and Kirsten Dunst star, and the voice cast includes Tommy Lee Jones and Frank Langella.

programme.title: Star Trek Into Darkness
programme.desc: In this thrilling sequel, the crew of the Enterprise discovers that Starfleet is in ruins after they are summoned home, and they venture into a war zone to find the powerful villain responsible for the devastation.

programme.title: Super 8
programme.desc: Kyle Chandler stars in this riveting sci-fi adventure set in a small Ohio town during the summer of 1979. A group of kids witness a train being derailed while filming an amateur movie, and soon an otherworldly force begins to stalk their town as people mysteriously disappear. Directed by J.J. Abrams and produced by Steven Spielberg.

programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: The minds of two cinematic geniuses meld in this visionary sci-fi epic directed by Steven Spielberg and based on a treatment by Stanley Kubrick. Haley Joel Osment is extraordinary as a robot programmed to have human emotions. After he is abandoned by his adoptive parents, he sets out to become a real boy.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A greedy CEO (Denis Leary) takes over a struggling toy company and begins producing militaristic action figures with computerized minds of their own. It's up to a pair of suburban kids to stop them from destroying their peaceful enemies after the violent commandoes spring to life. Gregory Smith and Kirsten Dunst star, and the voice cast includes Tommy Lee Jones and Frank Langella.

programme.title: Down to Earth
programme.desc: Chris Rock rolls into reincarnation madness in this comedy based on 1978's "Heaven Can Wait." When a heavenly mix-up causes struggling black stand-up comic Lance Barton (Rock) to die before his time, he is sent back down to the mortal world in the form of a rich---and white---old-timer named Charles Wellington. Regina King, Chazz Palminteri, Eugene Levy, Frankie Faison.

programme.title: Elizabethtown
programme.desc: A suicidal sneaker designer heads to Kentucky for his father's funeral and falls for a perky flight attendant along the way.

programme.title: Racing With the Moon
programme.desc: A bittersweet love story, set in 1942 California, about two buddies (Sean Penn, Nicolas Cage) and their sweethearts. Elizabeth McGovern, John Karlen, Rutanya Alda, Max Showalter, Kate Williamson. Directed by Richard Benjamin.

programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: The minds of two cinematic geniuses meld in this visionary sci-fi epic directed by Steven Spielberg and based on a treatment by Stanley Kubrick. Haley Joel Osment is extraordinary as a robot programmed to have human emotions. After he is abandoned by his adoptive parents, he sets out to become a real boy.

programme.title: Star Trek Into Darkness
programme.desc: In this thrilling sequel, the crew of the Enterprise discovers that Starfleet is in ruins after they are summoned home, and they venture into a war zone to find the powerful villain responsible for the devastation.

programme.title: Win a Date With Tad Hamilton!
programme.desc: Robert Luketic ("Legally Blonde") directed this cheery comedy about a self-centered movie star (Josh Duhamel) who tries to repair his bad-boy image by dating a naive fan (Kate Bosworth). No one is more surprised than the star when he begins to fall for the small-town girl. Nathan Lane, Sean Hayes, Gary Cole.

programme.title: Failure to Launch
programme.desc: In this breezy romantic comedy, the exasperated parents of a 35-year-old ladies' man who won't move out of the house hire a woman who specializes in convincing men to leave the nest.

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: John Cusack is in a groove as the owner of a Chicago used-record store in this smart 2000 romantic comedy. It's the story of a man who reflects on his messy love life while paying meticulous attention to all things vinyl. The charmer is based on the novel by Nick Hornby. Iben Hjejle, Jack Black, Todd Louiso, Joan Cusack, Tim Robbins, Lisa Bonet.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven
programme.desc: An architect sublets an apartment in San Francisco and finds it haunted by the ghost of its former tenant, who refuses to accept that she's dead. Reese Witherspoon and Mark Ruffalo sparkle in this divinely romantic comic fantasy. Donal Logue, Dina Waters, Ben Shenkman.

programme.title: Celeste and Jesse Forever
programme.desc: In this poignant romantic comedy, a successful media consultant named Celeste decides to divorce her lazy husband Jesse and focus on her career, but she later realizes that ending their relationship might have been an impulsive mistake.

programme.title: Failure to Launch
programme.desc: In this breezy romantic comedy, the exasperated parents of a 35-year-old ladies' man who won't move out of the house hire a woman who specializes in convincing men to leave the nest.

programme.title: Men at Work
programme.desc: Sanitation workers witness an altercation through a telescope and find a city official's body in the trash at the same location the next day; they fear being implicated and try to solve the case themselves.

programme.title: Jacob's Ladder
programme.desc: A Vietnam War veteran struggles with flashbacks and hallucinations. With the help of his new bride, he fights to keep sane while his brain fluctuates between reality and delusion.

programme.title: The Relic
programme.desc: A brain-hungry entity runs amok in a dank museum in this gory creature feature starring Penelope Ann Miller. It's up to biologist Margo Green (Miller) and Det. Vincent D'Agosta (Tom Sizemore) to end the lizardy brain-drainer's reign of terror. Linda Hunt, James Whitmore, Clayton Rohner, Chi Muoi Lo, Thomas Ryan, Robert Lesser, Diane Robin.

programme.title: Dickie Roberts: Former Child Star
programme.desc: David Spade is a hoot in this clever satire about a '70s TV icon who is desperately searching for another shot at fame and fortune. Mary McCormack and Jon Lovitz costar. The film is a Who's Who of former child stars, including Alyssa Milano, Danny Bonaduce, Willie Aames, Fred Berry, Todd Bridges, Barry Williams, Dustin Diamond, Tony Dow and Corey Feldman.

programme.title: A Very Brady Sequel
programme.desc: The '70s-trapped Bradys must travel to Hawaii to save the family after Carol's first husband shows up and threatens their idyllic existence. As Carol is torn between two husbands, Mike struggles to hold the family together and Alice cooks a lot of meat loaf. Shelley Long, Gary Cole, Tim Matheson, Christopher Daniel Barnes, Christine Taylor, Paul Sutera, Jennifer Elise Cox, Henriette Mantel.

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: John Cusack is in a groove as the owner of a Chicago used-record store in this smart 2000 romantic comedy. It's the story of a man who reflects on his messy love life while paying meticulous attention to all things vinyl. The charmer is based on the novel by Nick Hornby. Iben Hjejle, Jack Black, Todd Louiso, Joan Cusack, Tim Robbins, Lisa Bonet.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven
programme.desc: An architect sublets an apartment in San Francisco and finds it haunted by the ghost of its former tenant, who refuses to accept that she's dead. Reese Witherspoon and Mark Ruffalo sparkle in this divinely romantic comic fantasy. Donal Logue, Dina Waters, Ben Shenkman.

programme.title: Celeste and Jesse Forever
programme.desc: In this poignant romantic comedy, a successful media consultant named Celeste decides to divorce her lazy husband Jesse and focus on her career, but she later realizes that ending their relationship might have been an impulsive mistake.

programme.title: The Presidio
programme.desc: A police detective investigates a murder at the Presidio Army base in San Francisco with the help of his former commander officer, with whom he had a dramatic falling-out years earlier.

programme.title: HBO First Look: Empire of Light
programme.desc: An inside look at Sam Mendes' romantic drama starring Olivia Colman, Micheal Ward, Monica Dolan, Tom Brooke, Tanya Moodie, Hannah Onslow, Crystal Clarke, Toby Jones, and Colin Firth.

programme.title: DC League of Super-Pets
programme.desc: This animated tale focuses on Krypto the Super-Dog, otherwise known as Superman's pet. Since he has his own superpowers, Krypto enjoys saving the world with the Man of Steel. However, he finds himself challenged when Superman is kidnapped one day, and the other human superheroes can't help. With the help of superpower-infused animals in a shelter, it's up to Krypto to save the world and save his superhuman.

programme.title: Black Adam
programme.desc: Black Adam is awakened after being imprisoned for nearly five thousand years. This significant being tries to exist in modern climes despite his brusque ways and ancient-trained means. The members of the Justice Society of America try to befriend him, hopefully retraining him as well. They need to come together soon to fight a more powerful villain about to wreak havoc on the world.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: In this superhero stunner, after being sent to Earth from planet Krypton by his parents with a special object from his home planet in tow, Clark Kent grows up with the help of his earthly adopted parents and later assumes the identity of Superman and sets out to defend Earth from the villainous General Zod.

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine
programme.desc: This hilarious, raunchy comedy follows Adam and his three loser friends as they awaken after a night of drinking and hot-tubbing to find themselves back in 1986, where they try to fix all of the mistakes they made when they were younger. The foursome take advantage of this rip in the space-time continuum to win back lost loves and change their futures for the better.

programme.title: Hard Knocks In Season: Arizona Cardinals
Queen of the World
programme.desc: Offers unique insights into Her Majesty the Queen's role as a figure on the global stage, and the baton she is passing to the younger members of the Royal Family as they continue to build upon the Commonwealth, an association of free and independent nations, the majority of which were formerly part of the British Empire.

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: Stunning special effects highlight this old-fashioned disaster flick. When a scientist (Aaron Eckhart) discovers a catastrophic problem with Earth's core, he and a team of experts embark on a dangerous mission to the middle of the planet in the hopes of averting a global disaster. Hilary Swank, Stanley Tucci, Delroy Lindo, Tcheky Karyo, Richard Jenkins, Alfre Woodard.

programme.title: Limitless
programme.desc: Struggling author Eddie Morra (Bradley Cooper) overcomes his writer's block with a new drug that unlocks the full potential of his brain, and he forges a partnership with a powerful businessman (Robert De Niro) in this inventive, exciting thriller. Meanwhile, some dangerous characters discover Eddie's secret and come gunning for his dwindling supply of the pharmaceutical.

programme.title: Hard Knocks In Season: Arizona Cardinals
Branson
programme.desc: The history of Virgin Galactic, from conception to test flights, and the controversial bid from Virgin Atlantic to obtain government support during the Covid-19 pandemic. As the first passenger flight of Virgin Galactic approaches, Branson defends the benefits of privately funded space exploration and the paradoxes around Virgin's eco-messaging. Set for July 11, 2021, the launch day follows 17 years of research, testing, accidents, and setbacks, culminating in a successful flight.

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: Superb special effects propel this mind-bending sci-fi trip about a young man (Hayden Christensen) with the power to teleport himself anywhere on the planet. Life is a blast for him, until the arrival of a mysterious tracker (Samuel L. Jackson) from a secret society that is out to capture his kind and others like him. Directed by Doug Liman and written by David S. Goyer, Jim Uhls and Simon Kinberg, who adapted the script from Steven Gould's young-adult best sellers "Jumper" and "Exile."

programme.title: Larry Crowne
programme.desc: In this charming romantic comedy, an unemployed Navy veteran signs up for classes at a community college, and falls for his apathetic public-speaking teacher. In time, she begins to feel as if her problems fade away whenever she's with him.

programme.title: Black Nativity
programme.desc: In this contemporary classic based on the timeless play, a Baltimore teen rebels against his religious New York relatives during Christmas, and returns home to his friends and single mother to learn an important lesson about faith.

programme.title: Dr. Seuss' How the Grinch Stole Christmas
programme.desc: Jim Carrey is inspired as the mean, green Grinch in director Ron Howard's enchanting big-screen adaptation of Dr. Seuss's beloved children's fantasy. The classic holiday tale is vividly brought to life as the coldhearted Grinch plots to rob Whoville of its Yule celebration by masquerading as Santa and stealing all the presents.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: With the sinister Gellert Grindelwald wreaking havoc worldwide, Professor Albus Dumbledore must seek aid if he is to thwart the dark wizard's schemes. Dumbledore faces Grindelwald and the dark wizard's acolytes in an all-out battle for the greater good with the help of the charming Newt Scamander and Scamander's ragtag team of allies.

programme.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
programme.desc: Thorin Oakenshield and his band of dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf, continue their crusade to reclaim Erebor from the dragon Smaug in this sweeping fantasy that picks up where the events of "The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey" left off.

programme.title: King Richard
programme.desc: Family man Richard Williams recognizes the athletic prowess brimming in his daughters Venus and Serena, inspiring him to develop an unorthodox training plan to propel the girls to international recognition as Black female tennis aces. Based on a true story.

programme.title: HBO First Look: Empire of Light
programme.desc: An inside look at Sam Mendes' romantic drama starring Olivia Colman, Micheal Ward, Monica Dolan, Tom Brooke, Tanya Moodie, Hannah Onslow, Crystal Clarke, Toby Jones, and Colin Firth.

programme.title: Across the Universe
programme.desc: A trippy magical mystery tour that grooves to more than 30 Beatles songs performed by the cast. Evan Rachel Wood is an American named Lucy and Jim Sturgess plays Liverpudlian Jude, who falls in love with Lucy against the backdrop of the turbulent 1960s. Directed by Julie Taymor, who co-wrote the screenplay with Dick Clement and Ian La Frenais. Featured: performances by rock icons Joe Cocker ("Come Together") and Bono ("I Am the Walrus," "Lucy in the Sky with Diamonds").

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: Genetically engineered dinosaurs run amok on a remote island in this special-effects extravaganza. It's up to a paleontologist, a paleobotanist and a mathematician to outmaneuver the deadly beasts and find their way back to civilization. Based on Michael Crichton's best seller. The film won three Oscars, including Best Visual Effects.

programme.title: The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen
programme.desc: Seven literary characters join together to save powerful world leaders in this ripping yarn based on the comic-book series. Sean Connery is outstanding as intrepid explorer Allan Quatermain, who heads the group that includes Captain Nemo (Naseeruddin Shah), Tom Sawyer (Shane West) and Dorian Gray (Stuart Townsend).

programme.title: Transcendence
programme.desc: In this ingenious sci-fi thriller, an AI expert's consciousness is transferred into a computer after he is killed. As his awareness goes viral, he becomes an unstoppable force inhabiting every computer and electrical system on the planet.

programme.title: The Matrix Resurrections
programme.desc: This sci-fi series sequel revisits Neo, who seems to be feeling disconnected from his reality as he discusses his personal issues with a therapist-like Analyst. As he's also apparently taking some blue pills, people from his past start reappearing, offering him a red pill and some missing truths about his actual reality.

programme.title: Non-Stop
programme.desc: An air marshal pursues a hijacker on a nonstop flight from New York to London in this hair-raising thriller. When the mysterious villain begins killing passengers, the marshal becomes the prime suspect and must fight to clear his name.

programme.title: Death on the Nile
programme.desc: While vacationing in Egypt, detective Hercule Poirot finds himself in the thick of a love triangle that goes awry. However, when a wealthy young woman winds up dead, it is up to Poirot to track down the killer before he or she can claim a new victim. Based on the novel of the same name by Agatha Christie.

programme.title: FX's A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: Ebenezer Scrooge experiences a dark night of the soul in an original take on Charles Dickens' iconic ghost story.

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: A first-rate adaptation of Charles Dickens' classic novel about Ebenezer Scrooge, a London miser who, despite his wealth, refuses to make charitable contributions and treats his sole employee, Bob Cratchit, as an indentured servant. On Christmas Eve, Scrooge is visited by the ghost of his selfish business partner, Jacob Marley, and then by three more spirits that same night, an experience that forever changes his life.

programme.desc: Ebenezer Scrooge experiences a dark night of the soul in an original take on Charles Dickens' iconic ghost story.

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: A first-rate adaptation of Charles Dickens' classic novel about Ebenezer Scrooge, a London miser who, despite his wealth, refuses to make charitable contributions and treats his sole employee, Bob Cratchit, as an indentured servant. On Christmas Eve, Scrooge is visited by the ghost of his selfish business partner, Jacob Marley, and then by three more spirits that same night, an experience that forever changes his life.

programme.title: The Keys of the Kingdom
programme.desc: A Scottish priest finds it difficult to retire from his work in Civil War-era China, but upon returning to his homeland he finds a new purpose in life: Ministering to youngsters who, like him, have trouble determining their place in the world.

programme.title: Susannah of the Mounties
programme.desc: An orphan, who survived an Indian attack, becomes an ambassador for peace between the Blackfeet and the Canadian Mounties.

programme.title: The Silver Whip
programme.desc: Low-budget yarn about bandits vs. a stagecoach line. Dale Robertson, Rory Calhoun, Robert Wagner. Kathy: Kathleen Crowley. Bowen: James Millican. Waco: Lola Albright. Riley: J.M. Kerrigan. Harmon Jones directed.

programme.title: The Gambler from Natchez
programme.desc: Costume tale of the Mississippi river-boat days. Debra Paget plays her usual spitfire to Dale Robertson's vengeful hero. Andre: Kevin McCarthy. Captain Barbee: Thomas Gomez. Yvette: Lisa Daniels. Josh: Woody Strode. Claude: Douglas Dick.

programme.title: The Reward
programme.desc: There's more talk than action in this tale of a man (Efrem Zimbalist Jr.) fleeing from a murder rap in Mexico. Max von Sydow, Yvette Mimieux. Joaquin: Henry Silva. Carbajal: Gilbert Roland. Luis: Nino Castelnuovo. Lopez: Emilio Fernandez. Serge Bourguignon directed.

programme.title: The Last Hard Men
programme.desc: Charlton Heston as a retired sheriff hunted by a killer out to avenge his wife's death. James Coburn, Barbara Hershey. Menendez: Jorge Rivero. Nye: Michael Parks. programme.desc: Jeff Bridges and Valerie Perrine won praise in this story about stock-car racers and their followers. Geraldine Fitzgerald, Ned Beatty. Wayne: Gary Busey. Father: Art Lund. Colt: Ed Lauter. Morley: Gregory Walcott. Kyle: William Smith II. Directed by Lamont Johnson. Also called "Hard Driver."

programme.title: The Sentinel
programme.desc: Sparks fly in this riveting thriller about a Secret Service agent investigating his mentor, who is suspected of plotting to assassinate the president while having an affair with the First Lady. Adapted from the novel by Gerald Petievich, who served in the U.S. Army Intelligence Corps and worked at the Treasury Department.

programme.title: The New Mutants
programme.desc: When Illyana, Rahne, Sam, Danielle, and Roberto — five teenage mutants who are just discovering their superhuman abilities — are held inside an isolated hospital to be psychologically monitored, strange occurrences begin to happen. As events intensify, they find themselves embarking on a mission to escape the facility and save their lives, putting their newfound friendship and powers to the ultimate test.

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: In this heart pounding thriller, a young woman suspects that she's being quietly hunted by her own "double," who is slowly taking over her identity and might be planning to take her life.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A 21st-century construction worker discovers that his entire memory of the past derives from a chip implanted in his brain.

programme.title: The Drop
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding crime thriller, a man working in an illegal scheme funneling cash to the local organized-crime syndicate through "money drops" gets caught in the crossfire of a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: A charming Cameron Diaz stars as an uptight stock trader who meets and marries immature slacker Ashton Kutcher one drunken night in Las Vegas. They agree to an annulment---until he wins a $3 million jackpot with her quarter. Ordered by a judge to live for six months as husband and wife before either can claim the prize, they're bound to fall in love---if they don't kill each other first. Lake Bell

programme.title: The Heartbreak Kid
programme.desc: After a honeymooning newlywed (Ben Stiller) realizes he's involved in a nightmarish marriage, he meets the woman of his dreams (Michelle Monaghan). Hilarious remake of the 1972 hit film that starred Charles Grodin and Cybill Shepherd. Stiller's father Jerry Stiller costars as Doc. Directed by Bobby and Peter Farrelly, who co-wrote the script with Kevin Barnett, Leslie Dixon and Scot Armstrong.

programme.title: The Descent
programme.desc: In this intensely terrifying chiller, six young women become trapped underground with gruesome creatures while exploring a remote Appalachian cave. Shauna Macdonald, Natalie Mendoza, Alex Reid, Saskia Mulder, Nora-Jane Noone, MyAnna Buring. Written and directed by Neil Marshall.

programme.title: Fighting
programme.desc: Channing Tatum stars as a small-town kid inducted into the violent world of bare-knuckle boxing in this tense and gritty urban drama. Arriving in New York City with nothing but the shirt on his back, Shawn MacArthur earns a living by selling counterfeit goods on the street. Later, he crosses paths with crafty con artist Harvey Boarden, who offers to help the uneasy newcomer make some cash on the bare-knuckle circuit. Shawn quickly makes a name for himself by taking down every opponent he faces.

programme.title: The Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Ricardo Darin stars in this disturbing psychological thriller about an aspiring novelist who decides to take a closer look at a murder that occurred while Argentina was under the control of a military junta in the 1970s. Guillermo Francella, Javier Godino. Directed by Juan José Campanella.

programme.title: One Missed Call
programme.desc: Don't worry about the line going dead, it's listeners who are coming to violent ends. That's the premise of this horror tale in which victims receive phone messages containing a recording of their dying moments, and then three days later, they're dead. Meagan Good, Edward Burns, Shannyn Sossamon, Azura Skye, Ray Wise, Johnny Lewis, Jason Beghe. Directed by Eric Valette, the movie is a remake of Japanese filmmaker Takashi Miike's "Chakushin Ari" (2003).

programme.title: The Break-Up
programme.desc: Sidesplitting battle-of-the-sexes romp about an estranged couple uncomfortably sharing their condo.

programme.title: Australia
programme.desc: Gripping epic, set just prior to WWII, bursts at the seams with charismatic star turns by Nicole Kidman and Hugh Jackman. She's a prim English aristocrat who returns to Australia to claim an inherited ranch, and he's a rugged drover who helps her battle wealthy land-grabbers trying to steal it from her. To make matters worse, the Japanese are threatening to invade the continent. Bryan Brown, Jack Thompson, Essie Davis, Brandon Walters. Produced, cowritten and directed by Baz Luhrmann.

programme.title: Arsenal
programme.desc: This tense action thriller centers on a construction-company owner who must rescue his brother, a petty crook, after he is abducted by a vicious mobster. He is aided in his quest by a police detective and longtime friend.

programme.title: Limbo
programme.desc: As his family flees their home nation and its mounting socio-political turmoil, aspiring musician and Syrian refugee Omar finds himself stranded on a remote Scottish island. Omar then turns to his music in search of solace as his request for asylum continues to yield no verdict with the Scottish government.

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: In this rip-roaring sequel, amnesiac Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone wrong. Bourne is then cornered into using his accomplished assassin techniques to fight for survival and clear his name.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: After a robbery goes awry, a young man must call on his drug-smuggling former boss to protect his girlfriend from mobsters who want to kill both of them and retrieve their cargo.

programme.title: Beautiful Creatures
programme.desc: This epic romantic fantasy tells the story of Ethan, a young man who falls for Lena, a new girl in his small town, only to discover she comes from a mysterious family, all of whom all possess supernatural powers. Together, they team up to break a curse that casts Lena's entire future in doubt.

programme.title: An American Haunting
programme.desc: Donald Sutherland and Sissy Spacek star in this chilling ghost story based on the documented case of a family in early 19th-century rural Tennessee that is haunted by an evil spirit. James D'Arcy, Rachel Hurd-Wood. Directed by Courtney Solomon.

programme.title: Halloween Kills
programme.desc: Laurie Strode comes out triumphant in her showdown with Michael Myers after she leaves him burning in a cage in her basement. Though badly injured, she begins to feel a sense of relief, thinking she has finally gotten rid of her lifelong tormentor. When the bloodbath resumes, she is alerted that the evil serial killer has survived and that once again, she has to gear up to take him on. This time, however, Haddonfield rallies behind her, intent on eliminating Michael once and for all.

programme.title: The Purge: Anarchy
programme.desc: In this edge-of-your-seat sequel, a young couple must fight to survive after their car breaks down in the city during a night when all crime is legal.

programme.title: I, Robot

programme.title: William Shakespeare's Romeo + Juliet
programme.desc: A slick, fast-paced update of the Shakespeare tragedy, set in the violent netherworld of Verona Beach, where the Montague and Capulet families battle for power and territory... an age-old rivalry defied by two young lovers. Leonardo DiCaprio, Claire Danes, Brian Dennehy, John Leguizamo, Pete Postlethwaite, Paul Sorvino, Diane Venora, Harold Perrineau, Paul Rudd, Jesse Bradford, Dash Mihok.

programme.title: Ghost Ship
programme.desc: Brace yourself for a boatload of scares with this horror film. When the members of a salvage crew board a ship that's been missing for more than 40 years, they're unprepared for the ghosts they encounter.

programme.title: Iris

Jim Broadbent earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar as her doting husband, John Bayley. Hugh Bonneville, Penelope Wilton.

programme.title: Next

Jessica Biel, Thomas Kretschmann, Tory Kittles. Directed by Lee Tamahori.

programme.title: Unfinished Song

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You
programme.desc: In this wry comedy, four adult siblings reunite for their father's funeral, along with a host of childhood friends, spouses past and present and their uncomfortably talkative mom.

programme.title: A House on the Bayou

But when their alarmingly friendly neighbors show up uninvited, the weekend takes an unfortunate turn as a series of dark secrets threatens to split the family apart forever.

programme.title: Torn Hearts
programme.desc: A country music duo seek out the private mansion of their idol and end up in a twisted series of horrors that force them to confront the limits they'd go for their dreams.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: Naomi Watts shines in this thriller about a reporter who investigates her niece's mysterious death, which seems to be linked to a videotape. programme.title: Paranormal Activity
programme.desc: A married couple become convinced their house is haunted and set up cameras to capture the malevolent entities on video in this relentlessly terrifying tale of the supernatural.

programme.desc: John Carpenter directs Kurt Russell again in this sequel to "Escape from New York." This time out, antihero Snake Plissken (Russell) has just 10 hours to recover the key to a doomsday device from L.A. Island, the newest prison for "immoral" citizens.

programme.desc: In this intense action flick, the G.I. Joes are hunted by the U.S. government after the president is replaced with an impostor who plans to use a new superweapon to achieve global domination.

As Joel realizes that there's nothing left for him underground, he decides against all logic to venture out to Aimee, despite all the dangerous monsters that stand in his way.

Regina King, Chazz Palminteri, Eugene Levy, Frankie Faison.

programme.desc: Moving portrayal of real-life nun Helen Prejean, who develops a bond with a death-row inmate, in this powerful adaptation of Prejean's memoirs.

programme.desc: A widowed small-town pharmacist develops a reticent affection for a spunky divorcé, but soon her ex-husband returns and moves back in with her, claiming things will be different. Based on the novella by Max Schott.

Laurence Fishburne, Olivia Wilde, Joaquim De Almeida, J.R. Villareal.

programme.desc: A woman with amnesia catches a ride with her nurse in order to examine the clue to her identity.

programme.desc: Camille and Valmont are caught in a dangerous situation after working on a new plan to face their past ghosts.

Nelson, Rachel McAdams, Luke Wilson, Tyrone Giordano, Brian White.

programme.title: Dangerous Liaisons
programme.desc: Camille and Valmont continue to fight for their freedom, unaware of the threat of a returning figure.

Ordered by a judge to live for six months as husband and wife before either can claim the prize, they're bound to fall in love---if they don't kill each other first. Lake Bell

programme.title: The Heartbreak Kid
programme.desc: After a honeymooning newlywed (Ben Stiller) realizes he's involved in a nightmarish marriage, he meets the woman of his dreams (Michelle Monaghan). Hilarious remake of the 1972 hit film that starred Charles Grodin and Cybill Shepherd. Stiller's father Jerry Stiller costars as Doc. Directed by Bobby and Peter Farrelly, who co-wrote the script with Kevin Barnett, Leslie Dixon and Scot Armstrong.

programme.title: The Descent
programme.desc: In this intensely terrifying chiller, six young women become trapped underground with gruesome creatures while exploring a remote Appalachian cave. Shauna Macdonald, Natalie Mendoza, Alex Reid, Saskia Mulder, Nora-Jane Noone, MyAnna Buring. Written and directed by Neil Marshall.

programme.title: Fighting
programme.desc: Channing Tatum stars as a small-town kid inducted into the violent world of bare-knuckle boxing in this tense and gritty urban drama. Arriving in New York City with nothing but the shirt on his back, Shawn MacArthur earns a living by selling counterfeit goods on the street. Later, he crosses paths with crafty con artist Harvey Boarden, who offers to help the uneasy newcomer make some cash on the bare-knuckle circuit. Shawn quickly makes a name for himself by taking down every opponent he faces.

Guillermo Francella, Javier Godino. Directed by Juan José Campanella.

programme.title: One Missed Call
programme.desc: Don't worry about the line going dead, it's listeners who are coming to violent ends. That's the premise of this horror tale in which victims receive phone messages containing a recording of their dying moments, and then three days later, they're dead. Meagan Good, Edward Burns, Shannyn Sossamon, Azura Skye, Ray Wise, Johnny Lewis, Jason Beghe. Directed by Eric Valette, the movie is a remake of Japanese filmmaker Takashi Miike's "Chakushin Ari" (2003).

programme.title: The Break-Up
programme.desc: Sidesplitting battle-of-the-sexes romp about an estranged couple uncomfortably sharing their condo.

She's a prim English aristocrat who returns to Australia to claim an inherited ranch, and he's a rugged drover who helps her battle wealthy land-grabbers trying to steal it from her. To make matters worse, the Japanese are threatening to invade the continent. Bryan Brown, Jack Thompson, Essie Davis, Brandon Walters. Produced, cowritten and directed by Baz Luhrmann.

programme.title: Limbo
programme.desc: As his family flees their home nation and its mounting socio-political turmoil, aspiring musician and Syrian refugee Omar finds himself stranded on a remote Scottish island. Omar then turns to his music in search of solace as his request for asylum continues to yield no verdict with the Scottish government.

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: In this rip-roaring sequel, amnesiac Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone wrong. Bourne is then cornered into using his accomplished assassin techniques to fight for survival and clear his name.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: After a robbery goes awry, a young man must call on his drug-smuggling former boss to protect his girlfriend from mobsters who want to kill both of them and retrieve their cargo.

programme.title: Beautiful Creatures

Together, they team up to break a curse that casts Lena's entire future in doubt.

programme.title: Halloween Kills
programme.desc: Laurie Strode comes out triumphant in her showdown with Michael Myers after she leaves him burning in a cage in her basement. Though badly injured, she begins to feel a sense of relief, thinking she has finally gotten rid of her lifelong tormentor. When the bloodbath resumes, she is alerted that the evil serial killer has survived and that once again, she has to gear up to take him on. This time, however, Haddonfield rallies behind her, intent on eliminating Michael once and for all.

programme.title: The Purge: Anarchy
programme.desc: In this edge-of-your-seat sequel, a young couple must fight to survive after their car breaks down in the city during a night when all crime is legal.

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: Will Smith stars in this adaptation of Isaac Asimov's classic sci-fi stories, a thrilling blend of high-tech effects and slam-bang action. Smith plays a cop who uncovers a conspiracy involving murderous robots in 2035, but he's unable to get anyone to believe him.

programme.title: William Shakespeare's Romeo + Juliet
programme.desc: A slick, fast-paced update of the Shakespeare tragedy, set in the violent netherworld of Verona Beach, where the Montague and Capulet families battle for power and territory... an age-old rivalry defied by two young lovers. Leonardo DiCaprio, Claire Danes, Brian Dennehy, John Leguizamo, Pete Postlethwaite, Paul Sorvino, Diane Venora, Harold Perrineau, Paul Rudd, Jesse Bradford, Dash Mihok.

Jim Broadbent earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar as her doting husband, John Bayley. Hugh Bonneville, Penelope Wilton.

Jessica Biel, Thomas Kretschmann, Tory Kittles. Directed by Lee Tamahori.

programme.desc: When thieves rob the garage sale of suburban mom Marcia, a struggle ensues, and one of the thieves is killed. Unbeknownst to Marcia, the dead thief's sister returns, masquerading as a kind fellow garage sale enthusiast, with a vengeful plan to destroy Marcia's life.

programme.title: Into the Arms of Danger
programme.desc: A combative phone call with her mom, Laura, results in 17-year-old Jenny getting into a car accident on a desolate stretch of road. Jenny's call for help is answered by a pair of EMTs who promptly arrive to treat her wounds. But once Jenny is locked in the back of the ambulance, she discovers her "rescuers" are not really paramedics and are NOT taking her to the hospital, but rather to the remote home they share with their mother.

programme.title: The Secrets She Keeps
programme.desc: In a Sydney suburb, the lives of two pregnant women might collide in a shocking act that can hardly be undone.

programme.title: My Mom Made Me Do It
programme.desc: Star student Jade and her mother Frida, a crime author, have a great relationship. But when she discovers Frida's secret financial problems, Jade joins her bad-boy crush Rick in a series of high-profile burglaries that net enough cash to pay off Frida's debts. However when she tries to quit the criminal world, Rick's gang have other ideas, and now both Jade and Frida must fight for their very lives.

programme.title: Meet Me in St. Louis
programme.desc: Americana tunefest set against the backdrop of the impending 1904 World's Fair in St. Louis, as a family learn their father's business is transferring him to New York City, and his four daughters argue that they don't want to move. Songs include "The Boy Next Door," "The Trolley Song" and "Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas."

programme.title: The Bishop's Wife
programme.desc: Best Picture nominee about a clergyman whose prayers for divine guidance in his fund-raising efforts are answered in the form of a handsome, personable guardian angel who attempts to solve all his social and domestic problems. Remade in 1996 as "The Preacher's Wife."

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: Faithful version of the Charles Dickens classic about miserly Ebenezer Scrooge who, after being visited by three ghosts on Christmas Eve, learns the meaning of the true spirit of the holiday. Reginald Owen took the role of Scrooge in place of an ailing Lionel Barrymore. Real-life husband and wife Gene and Kathleen Lockhart play Mr. and Mrs. Bob Cratchit, and their daughter June costars as a Cratchit daughter.

programme.title: Meet John Doe
programme.desc: Frank Capra's classic about a down-on-his-luck baseball player who agrees to impersonate a fictional, idealistic "everyman" created by a newspaperwoman to boost circulation, and then finds himself at the center of a political movement.

programme.title: All That Heaven Allows
programme.desc: A widow causes a shock to her two adult children and upper-crust peers when she falls in love with a very young, very earnest man who grows and cares for trees.

programme.title: Pocketful of Miracles
programme.desc: A boozy, unkempt apple seller in Depression-era New York learns her long-overseas daughter, who believes her to be a wealthy dowager, is returning with her fiancé to visit, so the old gal gets help from a gangster in transforming into a society matron. Frank Capra retooled his own 1933 hit "Lady for a Day" for this Runyonesque yarn. The film's title tune was nominated for a Best Song Oscar.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Four sisters come of age during the American Civil War under the guidance of their mother, as their father is absent, ministering to the troops.

programme.title: Babes in Toyland
programme.desc: Two bumbling apprentices to the master toymaker of Toyland try to raise money to help Little Bo-Peep and her sweetheart Tom-Tom.

programme.title: Love Finds Andy Hardy
programme.desc: Andy finds himself the target of a lot of female attention as he prepares for the country club Christmas party, to which he had originally wanted to bring his girlfriend, Polly, until she announced she'd be going out of town for the holidays.

programme.title: The Apartment
programme.desc: An office worker loans his tiny New York City flat to his superiors for their secret romantic trysts and is subsequently promoted for maintaining silence about the affairs, but he runs into trouble when he gets involved with his callous boss' girlfriend. An Oscar winner for Best Picture and Director (Billy Wilder).

programme.title: The Man Who Came to Dinner
programme.desc: An adaptation of the Broadway hit about an imperious, acid-tongued lecturer who, after being injured in a fall in front of an Ohio family's abode, becomes their surprise houseguest while he recovers, and proceeds to drive them crazy.

programme.title: Holiday Affair
programme.desc: A department-store clerk meets a war widow who's shopping at Christmastime and romance ensues, much to the displeasure of her stuffed-shirt attorney boyfriend.

programme.title: In the Good Old Summertime
programme.desc: Two clerks in a turn-of-the-20th-century Chicago sheet-music store are intensely antagonistic toward each other, but unbeknownst to the two, they actually are getting very chummy as pen pals. A musical remake of "The Shop Around the Corner," in which the setting was changed from a Budapest sundries shop.

programme.title: How to Steal a Million
programme.desc: An art forger's daughter unwittingly enlists the aid of a detective to rob a museum, and he plans on arresting all of them when the job is done.

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: Larceny mixes with romance in this caper film about a millionaire (Steve McQueen) who masterminds a bank heist for fun and then enters into a game of cat and mouse with the insurance investigator (Faye Dunaway) assigned the case. Michel Legrand's score was Oscar nominated, and the song "The Windmills of Your Mind" was named Best Song.

programme.title: The Hot Rock

programme.title: Platoon
programme.desc: The diary of a green Vietnam GI shows the realities of that conflict as soldiers fight enemies, including bugs, C-rations, jungle rot, marijuana and a demoralized sergeant, as well as the Vietcong.

programme.title: Dead Presidents
programme.desc: Vivid account of a youth who finds few opportunities after returning from Vietnam, and plots to heist a truck carrying Federal Reserve money.

programme.title: Better Off Dead
programme.desc: Comedy about a teen (John Cusack) who is mortified when his girlfriend deep-sixes him for someone more popular. David Ogden Stiers, Kim Darby. Johnny: Demian Slade. Badger: Scooter Stevens. Monique: Diane Franklin. Mrs. Smith: Laura Waterbury. Directed by "Savage" Steve Holland.

programme.title: Major League
programme.desc: Misfits try to lift the Cleveland Indians out of a 34-year slump.

programme.title: The Sting
programme.desc: Paul Newman and Robert Redford star as Depression-era con men out to fool a big-time criminal in this Best Picture Oscar winner.

programme.title: The In-Laws
programme.desc: This remake of the 1979 comedy gem offers great performances by Michael Douglas and Albert Brooks in the roles originated by Peter Falk and Alan Arkin. Douglas is a CIA agent and Brooks is the podiatrist he involves in his spy jinks. David Suchet costars as the crazy villain, an international arms dealer who takes a liking to Brooks' character. Ryan Reynolds, Robin Tunney.

programme.title: Hide and Seek
programme.desc: Despite his lavish lifestyle, an affluent entrepreneur contends with uncertainty following his brother's disappearance. As he continues to investigate his brother's past, he finds himself inexorably drawn into a seedy world of gangsters, thieves, and vagabonds whose sinister designs put his family in peril.

programme.title: Blue Collar
programme.desc: Three Detroit auto factory workers struggling to get by blame their management and the union for their respective situations. They attempt to rob union HQ and uncover evidence linking the union to organized crime.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
programme.desc: The star (Mel Gibson) and writer (Randall Wallace) of "Braveheart" reunited for this powerful war epic based on a true story. Gibson plays Lt. Col. Hal Moore, who leads U.S. troops into one of the first and bloodiest battles in Vietnam in November 1965. Madeleine Stowe, Sam Elliott, Greg Kinnear, Chris Klein, Barry Pepper, Keri Russell.

programme.title: Dead For A Dollar
programme.desc: The western centers on bounty hunter Max Borlund and his fateful confrontation with lifelong nemesis Joe Cribbens. Borlund ventures into Mexico to pursue the kidnapped wife of a wealthy man. But on his journey, he reunites with Cribbens years after he sent him to jail.

programme.title: Bandit
programme.desc: Gilbert Galvan Jr. was known as The Flying Bandit during the 1980s. Gilbert escapes from a prison in Michigan and crosses the border toward Canada. While there, he changes his identity, falls for a social worker, and starts robbing banks. As he gets good at it, he also catches the attention of the media and, eventually, the authorities.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: The sole survivor of a failed heist is forced by the police to piece together events leading up to the deaths of his partners. Meanwhile, the motivations of the enigmatic criminal mastermind who planned the job remain a mystery.

programme.title: Deadlock
programme.desc: Following his son's death at the hands of the police, criminal Ron Whitlock embarks on a quest for revenge. Assembling a team of mercenaries in a plot to overthrow the government, Whitlock seizes power at a government-owned nuclear power plant, ultimately threatening the destruction of a nearby town until a retired Army ranger vows to face Whitlock head-on.

programme.title: Dead For A Dollar
programme.desc: The western centers on bounty hunter Max Borlund and his fateful confrontation with lifelong nemesis Joe Cribbens. Borlund ventures into Mexico to pursue the kidnapped wife of a wealthy man. But on his journey, he reunites with Cribbens years after he sent him to jail.

programme.title: Wrong Turn
programme.desc: At the Appalachian Trail areas, Jen goes on a hike with friends. They abandon the prescribed trail and wander off into areas that, unknown to them, are occupied by The Foundation. As they are about to find out, this reclusive hidden community zealously guards their privacy and territory—to the death.

programme.title: S.O.S. Survive or Sacrifice
programme.desc: Two estranged sisters reunite on a Mediterranean Island and agree to an exciting ride on a hot air balloon with the locals. But when a freak accident carries the balloon out to sea, the group find themselves battling for survival. Soon, the situation begins spiraling out of control, marking their lives forever.

programme.title: Public Enemy (feat. Kev Wells)
programme.desc: Stranded by their driver and unable to get to the show, rap legends Public Enemy are rescued by Kev, a 50-year-old Sheffield super-fan and unlikely savior who offers them a lift in his run-down economy car. A funny and thought-provoking take on fandom and the randomness of human connection.

programme.title: Spotlights: A Showtime Short Film Series
programme.sub-title: Tea Time on Hip Hop Nation
programme.desc: A classical radio host interviews for a job at Hip Hop Nation.

programme.title: Spotlights: A Showtime Short Film Series
programme.desc: A pregnant vegan wrestles with her newfound craving for meat. An exploration of the ethics of meat-eating and the fears inherent in becoming a parent.

programme.title: Immanence
programme.desc: Radio astronomers discover a mysterious signal in the deep sea that could be contact with extraterrestrials. After several terrifying manifestations threaten their beliefs, the team must fight to survive the ultimate evil.

In small-town Illinois, aspiring filmmaker Pat Johnson contends with the pitfalls of adolescence, from bullying to young love. However, when he discovers a new science fiction film, he may find himself at the center of events much greater than himself. Based on true events.

programme.title: Mob Town
programme.desc: In 1957, an FBI agent teams up with a local police officer to monitor the activities of New York City's most notorious Mafia leaders as they prepare for a large-scale gathering in upstate New York. It is up to the unlikely duo to piece together the purpose of such a meeting and thwart any instances of violence that may erupt as a result.

programme.title: NYC Point Gods
programme.desc: Against the backdrop of New York City's epidemic of drugs and crime in the 1980s and 1990s, a unique style of basketball emerged on the city's courts, defined by toughness, talent and swagger.

programme.title: Infinite Storm
programme.desc: The thriller tells the true story of professional climber Pam Bales. Facing an impending blizzard on her way down from Mount Washington, Bales discovers a stranded man in need of help. She undertakes the impossible mission of saving his life. With their lives on the line, they must leave the mountain together before nightfall.

programme.title: Almost Famous
programme.desc: This spirited semiautobiography rocks! Writer-director Cameron Crowe, who wrote for Rolling Stone as a 15-year-old, charts a teen's coming of age around the Age of Aquarius. Patrick Fugit is wonderful as the young incarnation of Crowe, who learns all about life, love, sex, drugs and especially rock and roll while touring with a rising band. Kate Hudson, Billy Crudup, Frances McDormand.

programme.title: Before I Go to Sleep
programme.desc: In this brilliant mind-bender, a woman wakes up every morning with no memory of her past. She soon makes a shocking discovery that alters her perception of reality and leaves her uncertain of whom to trust.

programme.title: X
programme.desc: In the 1970s, an adult film crew goes to a remote Texas farm to shoot a film. The elderly couple they are renting from is unaware of what the crew intends for their property. But they do take an unusual interest in the young team. When the couple discovers the real intention of the youngsters, a night of profit-making passion turns to terror as they fight for their lives against their enraged hosts.

programme.title: Midsommar
programme.desc: Just as their relationship is on the brink of falling apart, couple Dani and Christian are brought closer by a family tragedy. The mourning Dani then joins Christian and his friends, Josh and Mark, on a trip to a rural Swedish village that is celebrating a once-in-a-blue-moon festival. As the tourists partake in the celebrations, they discover that the idyllic community holds many unnerving secrets, and it all unfolds in broad daylight.

programme.title: LX 2048
programme.desc: In 2048, humankind is forced to spend their waking hours at night and live in virtual reality as the ozone layer has been destroyed to a point that it isn't safe for anyone to go outside during the daytime. Adam Bird, however, is intent on living a normal life: he insists on leaving the house, having a physical office, and not taking a government-mandated pill. Everything seems to be going well for him until one day, he discovers that he is suffering from a mysterious heart ailment.

programme.title: Ema
programme.desc: After artistic free spirit Ema's life is upended by a failed adoption of a seven-year-old child, her marriage is put in shambles. Embarking on a journey of personal liberation and self-discovery, she dances and seduces her way into a brand new life.

programme.title: My Tender Matador
programme.desc: An illicit love affair unfolds between a young guerrilla warrior and a transgender individual amidst Chile's grim Pinochet regime.

programme.title: Depeche Mode 101
programme.desc: Filmmaker D.A. Pennebaker captures the music and spirit of the English alt-rock group Depeche Mode and the vibrant fandom that surrounded the band on their 1988 world tour. The documentary climaxes with a concert at the Rose Bowl in Pasadena, Cal.

programme.title: Woodshock
programme.desc: A grieving young woman begins using a powerful drug to ease her pain. As she takes more and more of it, the drug's hallucinatory effects loosen her grip on reality in this haunting psychological drama.

programme.title: Meet Me in the Bathroom
programme.desc: An in-depth look into the early 2000s New York City rock scene. In a time when many thought the city would no longer produce iconic rock bands, a rebirth of sorts swept through the city. Following bands like The Strokes, LCD Soundsystem, Yeah Yeah Yeahs, and more, this documentary takes you back to where it all started. Based on the book written by Lizzie Goodman.

programme.title: Lady Bird
programme.desc: In this charming coming-of-age tale set in 2002 Sacramento, an eccentric teenager attending a Catholic high school deals with the pangs of first love and clashes with her mother over her plans for the future.

programme.title: All I Want for Christmas (2021)
programme.desc: A young girl stumbles upon a Christmas caper involving a fleet of small robots that just might not be the toys they seem, while helping several friends get Santa's attention for putting them on the naughty list.

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: A revolution brews on a train containing the last of humanity in this thrilling sci-fi film set during a new ice age. When the lower classes in the back cars invade the upper classes in the front, the superpowered locomotive speeds toward tragedy.

programme.title: It Comes at Night
programme.desc: In this unnerving horror film, a married couple and their teenage son isolate themselves from the rest of humanity when a plague throws civilization into chaos. However, their secluded existence is threatened when a young family seek shelter with them.

programme.title: Monstrous
programme.desc: Laura, the mother to seven-year-old Cody, decides to get a new but isolated house near a lake. They are trying to live a new life after escaping Laura's abusive ex-husband. Amidst the appeal of their life and surroundings, a new challenge appears in the form of a monstrous being that emerges from the waters near their property, haunting them in more ways than one.

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: This Korean take on the "Godzilla" legend is an alternately spine-tingling and rib-tickling creature feature about a dysfunctional Korean family trying to rescue their prized daughter (Ko Ah-sung), who's been snatched by a mutant monster and taken to its lair. Song Kang-ho, Bae Doo-na. Directed by Bong Joon-ho, who co-wrote the script with Baek Chul-hyun.

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: A revolution brews on a train containing the last of humanity in this thrilling sci-fi film set during a new ice age. When the lower classes in the back cars invade the upper classes in the front, the superpowered locomotive speeds toward tragedy.

programme.title: Nothing Compares
programme.desc: An intimate look into the life of controversial Irish singer-songwriter Sinéad O'Connor. Beginning with the release of her debut album in 1987, the narrative charts six years in O'Connor's career filled with rebellion, iconoclasm, and creativity as the musician strove to rewrite the script of mainstream music and femininity in the face of rampant sociopolitical and sociocultural change.

programme.title: Surge
programme.desc: Over the course of 24 hours, an airport security worker embarks on a self-destructive and impulsive rebellion throughout London. Having borne the brunt of emotional alienation and economic exploitation, he experiences a sense of release and self-fulfillment through the breakdown of his sanity.

programme.title: Murina
programme.desc: Julija, a teenage girl who puts up with her controlling father, goes on a weekend trip with one of his friends. Julija's father, Ante, makes a living by diving in the Adriatic Sea and fishing for moray eels. When her father's friend and potential buyer, Javier, whisks her away, Ante starts to worry about the land deal he is about to close.

programme.title: My Salinger Year
programme.desc: Joanna lands a job as an assistant to Margaret, J.D. Salinger's literary agent, after she leaves graduate school in order to pursue her dream to become a writer. Her main task is to process the immense amount of fan mail the famous writer receives from day to day and reply with a template answer. However, as she goes through each one, she cannot help but be moved by some. She then decides to forgo impersonal responses and write her own replies.

programme.title: The Circle
programme.desc: A young woman lands a job at a social-media company that preaches the value of complete transparency and inspires a cult-like devotion in its employees. However, she learns that they're hiding a nefarious agenda in this timely and unnerving thriller.

programme.title: Inside Llewyn Davis
programme.desc: A homeless folk singer seeks success in Greenwich Village in the early 1960s, but faces hardship and disappointment during a harsh winter in this captivating period drama. Later, he takes a road trip to Chicago in the hope of impressing a club owner who could give him his big break.

programme.title: Time Now
programme.desc: A young mother returns to her estranged hometown of Detroit after the sudden death of her twin brother and immerses herself in his friend group, soon discovering that his death is not what it seems.

Skateboarding remains high on his list, so much so that he plans to make it as a professional in this field. But his father is pressuring him to focus on his studies so he can go to college.

programme.desc: A yuletide extravaganza of soon-to-be-classic songs and comedy sketches.

programme.desc: In this gripping drama, a group of U.S. soldiers return home after serving in Iraq in this perceptive drama, but their attempts at reintegrating into civilian life are complicated by their traumatic memories of war and pressure from military brass to remain stoic.

Based on the novel by Robert Kimmel Smith.

programme.desc: This delightfully offbeat comedy centers on a single woman who decides to conceive via artificial insemination. But seven years later, she reunites with a friend and comes to question the child's paternity after he recalls a last-minute mix-up involving the sperm sample she used.

programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in this highly stylized 1998 thriller directed by Brain De Palma. Julia Roberts earned her first Oscar nomination as Best Supporting Actress for her portrayal of stubborn Shelby. Harling costars as the minister.

programme.title: Vampire Academy
programme.desc: Vampire-human hybrid Rose is tasked with protecting a benevolent breed of mortal vampires known as the Moroi from a race of ruthless, eternal bloodsuckers called the Strigoi in this thrilling adaptation of the best-selling book.

programme.desc: A high society law student and middle-class musician marry; only to have their whirlwind romance come to a screeching halt when the young woman receives a cancer diagnosis.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
programme.desc: Texan Renee Zellweger boasts a perfect English accent in this delightful adaptation of Helen Fielding's novel. She plays Bridget, a London "singleton" desperate to lose weight, cut down on her vices and find Mr. Right. The film chronicles her romantic entanglements with two gents: her playboy boss (Hugh Grant) and a snooty lawyer (Colin Firth). Jim Broadbent, Gemma Jones.

programme.title: Murder by Numbers
programme.desc: Moody crime drama about a detective with a haunted past. Her probe of a grisly killing points to two high-schoolers who have done their homework when it comes to pulling off a "perfect murder."

programme.title: Six Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Summer 1939. The Nazi High Command send their daughters to finishing school in England. A teacher senses the coming atrocities, but must navigate a web of double-agents to raise the alarm.

programme.title: August: Osage County
programme.desc: In this hilarious and heartbreaking comedy-drama, a dysfunctional family air their dirty laundry as they gather to mourn the loss of their patriarch. Meanwhile, the deceased's widow struggles with mouth cancer and a growing dependency on pain pills. Based on the Tony-winning play.

programme.desc: Oscar-nominated adaptation of Jane Austen's novel about the still-single Dashwood sisters and how they cope with men, marriage and money after their father dies. The screenplay (written by star Emma Thompson) was the sole Oscar winner out of seven nominations.

Jackson, Patrick Malahide, Craig Bierko, David Morse.

programme.title: Free Birds
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy for the entire family, two turkeys travel back in time to the first Thanksgiving in order to change the traditional menu and save their kind from being served with a side of cranberry sauce for the holiday.

programme.title: Christmas in Compton
programme.desc: In this hilarious holiday comedy, the proud owner of a popular Christmas-tree lot finds his future in jeopardy when his entrepreneurial son pulls a stunt that could put him out of business.

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: From Mike Judge, the creator of "Beavis and Butt-head" and "King of the Hill," comes this outrageous laughathon about a U.S. soldier (Luke Wilson) who gets involved in an experiment and awakens 500 years later in a world filled with dumb people, making him the smartest man on the planet. Maya Rudolph, Dax Shepard, Terry Alan Crews, David Herman, Michael McCafferty, Thomas Haden Church. Judge directed and co-wrote the script with Etan Cohen.

programme.title: Rapture-Palooza
programme.desc: In this hilariously irreverent comedy, Seattle suburbanites Ben and Lindsey learn that life after the Rapture is no picnic when the Beast himself moves into their neighborhood and aims to make lovely Lindsey his infernal bride.

programme.title: Slaughterhouse Rulez
programme.desc: An elite British boarding school becomes a bloody battleground when a mysterious sinkhole happens near a controversial fracking site. As the pupils and teachers are trapped, a new informal social system is established.

programme.title: Bye Bye, Love
programme.desc: Upbeat tale about the trials and tribulations faced by three divorced friends who try to cope with parenthood, ex-wives and bitterness.

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: A pair of high-school geeks who are hapless with members of the opposite sex create what they believe is the ideal woman using a computer, and then a lightning storm brings that woman to life.

programme.title: Good Burger
programme.desc: Employees at competing fast-food chains---the up-and-coming Good Burger and the sneaky Mondo Burger---butt heads over who can climb to the top of the business. But the devious Mondo manager sets his sights on stealing Good Burger's secret-sauce recipe. Kenan Thompson, Kel Mitchell, Sinbad, Jan Schwieterman.

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: A motley crew of high rollers races for a $2 million jackpot in this zany ensemble comedy from director Jerry Zucker ("Airplane!"). The fun begins when a Las Vegas casino bigwig (John Cleese) selects six people to hunt for a prize in New Mexico. Among the participants: an Italian narcoleptic (Rowan Atkinson), a gambler (Jon Lovitz) and a bighearted mom (Whoopi Goldberg). Seth Green.

programme.title: Happily N'Ever After
programme.desc: When the wizard of Fairy Tale Land goes on vacation, Cinderella's wicked stepmother mounts a takeover, endangering various storybook happy endings. This delightful animated film features the voices of Sigourney Weaver and Sarah Michelle Gellar. Other voices include Freddie Prinze Jr., Andy Dick, Wallace Shawn, Patrick Warburton and George Carlin. Directed by Paul J. Bolger.

programme.title: Happily N'ever After 2: Snow White - Another Bite at the Apple
programme.desc: A teenage Snow White who would rather hang out with fairy-tale friends than lend a hand to the peasants soon realizes she's the one who will need help when a witch intends to wed her father and take control of the entire kingdom.

programme.title: Early Man
programme.desc: In this charming stop-motion animated comedy set in prehistoric times, a tribe of primitive hunters clash with the emissaries of a distant empire that has mastered bronze-making. In time, they decide to settle their differences via a game of soccer.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Afterlife
programme.desc: Single mother Callie seeks a fresh start with her two children, moving her family to a rural midwestern town. Yet they soon experience a host of supernatural circumstances, unveiling a strange connection to the children's eccentric grandfather. Based on the 1984 cult classic film.

programme.title: Good Burger
programme.desc: Employees at competing fast-food chains---the up-and-coming Good Burger and the sneaky Mondo Burger---butt heads over who can climb to the top of the business. But the devious Mondo manager sets his sights on stealing Good Burger's secret-sauce recipe. Kenan Thompson, Kel Mitchell, Sinbad, Jan Schwieterman.

programme.title: Weird Science

programme.title: Sex Tape
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, a married couple go on a mad dash to recover a sex tape of theirs that accidentally went viral. However, their desperate race reveals more about them than their steamy video.

programme.title: Road Trip
programme.desc: Tom Green's film debut casts him as a perpetual college student narrating the raucous odyssey of four university buddies as they make their way from Ithaca, N.Y., to Austin. Their goal: retrieve an illicit video, which was mailed by mistake. Breckin Meyer, Seann William Scott, Amy Smart, Paulo Costanzo, DJ Qualls, Rachel Blanchard.

programme.title: French Exit
programme.desc: Due to financial incapacity after her husband's death, aging socialite Frances is forced to move out of her luxurious Manhattan apartment and into a small, empty flat in Paris with her son Malcolm and their pet cat. As they try to rebuild their lives, they meet a plethora of colorful characters: the lonely Mme. Reynard, psychic Madeleine, and private detective Julius.

programme.title: Bachelor Party
programme.desc: Rowdy friends throw a bachelor party for a groom-to-be, whose future bride infiltrates the bash to test his fidelity. Meanwhile, her rich daddy does his best to stop the wedding.

programme.title: In Her Shoes
programme.desc: Toni Collette and Cameron Diaz shine as a pair of mismatched sisters in this touching character study. Collette is the sensible, driven one, and Diaz is an irresponsible, self-centered party girl who may have stepped on her sibling's toes once too often. Shirley MacLaine is excellent as their grandmother, a Florida retiree whom the women thought was dead. Directed by Curtis Hanson. Mark Feuerstein, Ken Howard, Candice Azzara, Norman Lloyd, Francine Beers.

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: A widow named Marnie relocates to L.A. to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mom's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others in this charming comedy-drama: She dates an ex-cop, helps an Apple Store employee study for school and pays for a lesbian wedding.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: Bridget Jones, now a fortysomething news producer, discovers that she's pregnant in this hilarious comedy sequel. However, she isn't sure if the baby's father is Mark Darcy, her on-and-off boyfriend, or Jack Qwant, her new American love interest.

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: A lonely, obsessive cable installer becomes fixated on a customer.
